(6) : ((P) - 23))))) 00405 # endif 00406 00407 00408 // --- ATtinyX4 + ATtinyX7 --- 00409 #elif defined(__AVR_ATtiny24__) || defined(__AVR_ATtiny44__) || defined(__AVR_ATtiny84__) || defined(__AVR_ATtiny87__) || defined(__AVR_ATtiny167__) 00410 # if defined(ARDUINO_AVR_DIGISPARKPRO) || PIN_PA7 == 5 00411 // Strange enumeration of pins on Digispark board and core library 00412 #define __digitalPinToPortReg(P) (((P) <= 4) ? &PORTB : &PORTA) 00413 #define __digitalPinToDDRReg(P) (((P) <= 4) ? &DDRB : &DDRA) 00414 #define __digitalPinToPINReg(P) (((P) <= 4) ? &PINB : &PINA) 00415 #define __digitalPinToBit(P) (((P) <= 2) ? (P) : (P) - 8 ) 00423 # endif 00424 00425 // --- Other --- 00426 #else 00427 00428 #define I2C_SDA_PIN SDA 00429 #define I2C_SCL_PIN SCL 00430 00431 #define SPI_HW_SS_PIN SS 00432 #define SPI_HW_MOSI_PIN MOSI 00433 #define SPI_HW_MISO_PIN MISO 00434 #define SPI_HW_SCK_PIN SCK 00435 00436 00437 #endif 00438 //#endif //#ifndef digitalPinToPortReg 00439 00440 00441 #ifndef digitalWriteFast 00442 #if (defined(__AVR__) || defined(ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)) && defined(__digitalPinToPortReg) 00443 #define digitalWriteFast(P, V) \ 00444 if (__builtin_constant_p(P)) { \ 00445 BIT_WRITE(*__digitalPinToPortReg(P), __digitalPinToBit(P), (V)); \ 00446 } else { \ 00447 digitalWrite((P), (V)); \ 00448 } 00449 #else 00450 #define digitalWriteFast digitalWrite 00451 #endif 00452 #endif 00453 00454 00455 #ifndef pinModeFast 00456 #if (defined(__AVR__) || defined(ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)) && defined(__digitalPinToPortReg) 00457 #define pinModeFast(P, V) \ 00458 if (__builtin_constant_p(P) && __builtin_constant_p(V)) { \ 00459 if (V == INPUT_PULLUP) {\ 00460 BIT_CLEAR(*__digitalPinToDDRReg(P), __digitalPinToBit(P)); \ 00461 BIT_SET(*__digitalPinToPortReg(P), __digitalPinToBit(P)); \ 00462 } else { \ 00463 BIT_WRITE(*__digitalPinToDDRReg(P), __digitalPinToBit(P), (V)); \ 00464 } \ 00465 } else { \ 00466 pinMode((P), (V)); \ 00467 } 00468 #else 00469 #define pinModeFast pinMode 00470 #endif 00471 #endif 00472 00473 00474 #ifndef digitalReadFast 00475 #if (defined(__AVR__) || defined(ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR)) 00476 #define digitalReadFast(P) ( (int) __digitalReadFast((P)) ) 00477 #define __digitalReadFast(P ) \ 00478 (__builtin_constant_p(P) ) ? \ 00479 (( BIT_READ(*__digitalPinToPINReg(P), __digitalPinToBit(P))) ?
